user.title: Connect to Zyxel Multy Router
user.description: Enter the local admin credentials for your Zyxel Multy router. The username is usually 'admin'. The password is the one you set in the router's web GUI (not your Google/cloud account).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the router. Check the IP address and make sure Home Assistant can reach it.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check the admin password (this is the local router password, not your Google/cloud account).
